Create Table:
CREATE TABLE `user_lotto` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `turn` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `lotto_one` varchar(3) NOT NULL,
  `lotto_two` varchar(3) NOT NULL,
  `lotto_three` varchar(3) NOT NULL,
  `lotto_four` varchar(3) NOT NULL,
  `lotto_five` varchar(3) NOT NULL,
  `lotto_six` varchar(3) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `turn_idx` (`turn`),
  CONSTRAINT `turn` FOREIGN KEY (`turn`) REFERENCES `winner` (`turn`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=21 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='회차별 사용자의 로또'
